_header: Thou shalt have one god and no moo
Note: These couplets are also interspersed through the prose Exposition of the Commandments which forms a part of the Wycliffite expansion of The Lay Folk’s Catechism (see 672). MSS Cambridge UK, Sidney Sussex College 55 and Ushaw, St Cuthbert’s College 28 are copies of the Speculum Christiani, the only MSS to contain this form of the Commandments.

BodAsh59.First Lines:
þowe shalt haue one god and no mooþou shalt not swere in
                    veyne al soLooke þou halowe þine halidayeffader moder
                    þou worship aye…
BodAsh59.Last Lines:
…þy neghboires wyf coveyte þou noughthors oxse asse
                    no oþer ought

CULEe435a.First Lines:
Thow schalt haffe one god & no moAnd ower all theyng loffe hem
                    all so…
CULEe435a.Last Lines:
…ho so well to heuen gooKepe hem All & breke non of
                    tho

CULFf238.First Lines:
Thou schalt haue oo god and no mooAnd ouer all thyng houe hym
                    alsoGoddys name in ydyll take þu noughtNe swere be noþyng
                    þat he haþe wrought…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…Who so wole to heuene gooKepe þem all breke noon of
                    thoo
CULFf238.Attributed Title:
Here…begynneþ þe x commaundementis of almyȝty god (f.
                        32ra)
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.

CamSidney55.First Lines:
Thu schalt one god and no moOuer alle thynge loue hym alsoAnd
                    thy neghbor both frende and foo…
CamSidney55.Last Lines:
…Ne horse ne ox schepe ne asseNe none of his thynge more or
                    lasse
CamSidney55.Note: Nine couplets, missing one for the second commandment.
CamSidney55.Editions:
Holmstedt,  Gustaf,
                        ed.  
             Speculum Christiani.
EETS
         o.s. 182 (1933); repr. 1988: lxxiv-lxxv.

BLHar1706.First Lines: Thou shalt haue on god and no mooAnd ouer alle þinge loue hym also…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …þese ben þe hestes tenneþat god comaundeþ to alle men

BLHar2339.First Lines:
Thou schalt haue o god & nomo& ouer al þing loue him
                    also…
BLHar2339.Last Lines:
…Who so wole to heuene goKepe hem ane breke noon of
                    þo
BLHar2339.Attributed Title: Here bigynnen þe x comandementis of god (rubricated, f. 116)

BLHar5396.First Lines: Thow schalt haue on god & no moAnd ouyr all thyng loue hym also…
BLHar5396.Last Lines: …Ho so wyl to heuyn goKepe hym all breke non of tho
BLHar5396.Attributed Title: The x Comaundementys (added by a later hand to upper margin, f. 285v)

Ushaw28.First Lines:
þu shalt haue one god & no mor& ouer thyng loue him
                    also…
Ushaw28.Last Lines:
…þies ben þe comawndentes tenþat comawndet to
                    al men
